alert.note: Alert for Bath; Fleming; Rowan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 31 at 11:15PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Bath, Fleming and north central Rowan Counties through MIDNIGHT EST... At 1114 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of Muses Mills to near Bethel. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Oakley around 1125 PM EST. Flemingsburg, Poplar Plains and Hillsboro around 1130 PM EST. Other locations in the path of these storms include Goddard, Wallingford, Muses Mills and Plummers Landing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
